name: EcoMagnia
description:
A game about swift problem solving and magnets, sort the falling items in time and survive for as long as you can !

Made and uploaded for the ScoreSpace Jam #18, using SilentWolf for online leaderboards and the Godot game engine.

This is the Jam version of the game, it'll be updated again after the jam is over. 

Thanks for reading and have fun!
